title: ii release liveshow 12/10/18
body:
• brent is back with the preshow a king (notes made for that too)
  • THEY’RE IN FRONT OF THE CHRISTMAS TREE
  • the ii movie is the equivalent of them birthing twins. there was a whole mpreg analogy. i’d get kicked off tumblr if i explained it
  • dan just called the amazon edition the placenta if i wasn’t taking notes i’d leave 
  • answer time!! send dan asks for answer time on wednesday :)
  • they’re going to do a twitter viewing party for ii maybe next wednesday (the 19th i believe)!
  • dan keeps scratching the holographic couple and everyone’s angry
  • their christmas tree is now called peachy ruby because that’s the first person phil saw in the chat
  • this year two teenagers delivered the tree instead of a man in a kilt and phil is livid 
  • the tree is classy, silver and gold, sparse, and shaped realistically. respect trees of all shapes and sizes
  • THEY HAVE RAVE TREE MODE ON THE TREE
  • a white squirrel ornament showed up on their tree that dan said they’d had for ages and phil said he’d never seen before–turned out one of their friends randomly hung it on their tree
  • they asked dnp to be in rewind but they were ‘unavailable’ maybe they were or maybe they just didn’t want to do it we’ll never know
  • they ranted that people weren’t ‘left out’ of rewind they just didn’t go 
  • phil liked seeing safya and asap science in rewind but thought it was incoherent. he doesn’t think it deserves to be the second worst video on youtube
  • dan thinks it’s insane that they can even make rewind happen, and he thinks the production itself is incredible. he just think the creation directive is messy. he thinks they should’ve hired a better director 
  • pinof!!
  • they remember pinof 1 VERY clearly 
  • they sat together editing pinof for 3 full days and still kept laughing i’m :( 
  • they’re really proud of this pinof 
  • pinof is michaelangelo’s david; the sharpie is his penis and the whiskers are his ass
  • dan seems reluctant to do bloopers
  • they went to brazil! 
  • they thought brazil was beautiful, and they both want to go back! 
  • instead of gamingmas, they’re going to do dilmas! 5 days of dil. they’ve already planned the videos and they’re gonna be dramatic as hell
  • there’s a couple more gaming videos before dilmas, and one of them is a ‘conclusion to something’ 
  • dnp popup shop in london soon! it’s in the same place they were at in the festive ditl 
  • the popup shop is gonna have themed areas and it’s supposed to look really cool. they’re gonna post some stories of it
  • before signing off, they gave an emotional thank you to everyone who supported them on tour and bought their dvd <3

  • the tree is classy, silver and gold, sparse, and shaped realistically. respect trees of all shapes and sizes
  • THEY HAVE RAVE TREE MODE ON THE TREE
  • a white squirrel ornament showed up on their tree that dan said they’d had for ages and phil said he’d never seen before–turned out one of their friends randomly hung it on their tree
  • they asked dnp to be in rewind but they were ‘unavailable’ maybe they were or maybe they just didn’t want to do it we’ll never know
  • they ranted that people weren’t ‘left out’ of rewind they just didn’t go 
  • phil liked seeing safya and asap science in rewind but thought it was incoherent. he doesn’t think it deserves to be the second worst video on youtube
  • dan thinks it’s insane that they can even make rewind happen, and he thinks the production itself is incredible. he just think the creation directive is messy. he thinks they should’ve hired a better director 
  • pinof!!

  • the popup shop is gonna have themed areas and it’s supposed to look really cool. they’re gonna post some stories of it
